              ["The Request will be public readable and leave a tray behind"]
            ]
          },

          "type": "bulleted_list",

      },
      "ce95cffc-fdbc-412f-a670-a7a0820c3eab": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1551931108765,
          "id": "ce95cffc-fdbc-412f-a670-a7a0820c3eab",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1551931108765,
          "parent_id": "d18e6e45-85fd-4c78-8371-0a87e9a1adcd",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "#!/bin/bash\n    \n# CORS is the way to communicate, so lets response to the server first\necho \"Content-type: text/html\"    # set the data-type we want to use\necho \"\"    # we dont need more rules, the empty line initiate this.\n\n# CORS are set in stone and any communication from now on will be like reading a html-document.\n# Therefor we need to create any stdout in html format!\n    \n# create html scructure and send it to stdout\necho \"<!DOCTYPE html>\"\necho \"<html><head>\"\n    \n# The content will be created depending on the Request Method \nif [ \"$REQUEST_METHOD\" = \"GET\" ]; then\n   \n    # Note that the environment variables $REQUEST_METHOD and $QUERY_STRING can be processed by the shell directly. \n    # One must filter the input to avoid cross site scripting.\n    \n    Var1=$(echo \"$QUERY_STRING\" | sed -n 's/^.*var1=\\([^&]*\\).*$/\\1/p')    # read value of \"var1\"\n    Var1_Dec=$(echo -e $(echo \"$Var1\" | sed 's/+/ /g;s/%\\(..\\)/\\\\x\\1/g;'))    # html decode\n    \n    Var2=$(echo \"$QUERY_STRING\" | sed -n 's/^.*var2=\\([^&]*\\).*$/\\1/p')\n    Var2_Dec=$(echo -e $(echo \"$Var2\" | sed 's/+/ /g;s/%\\(..\\)/\\\\x\\1/g;'))\n    \n    # create content for stdout\n    echo \"<title>Bash-CGI Example 1</title>\"\n    echo \"</head><body>\"\n    echo \"<h1>Bash-CGI Example 1</h1>\"\n    echo \"<p>QUERY_STRING: ${QUERY_STRING}<br>var1=${Var1_Dec}<br>var2=${Var2_Dec}</p>\"    # print the values to stdout\n\nelse\n\n    echo \"<title>456 Wrong Request Method</title>\"\n    echo \"</head><body>\"\n    echo \"<h1>456</h1>\"\n    echo \"<p>Requesting data went wrong.<br>The Request method has to be \\\"GET\\\" only!</p>\"\n\nfi\n\necho \"<hr>\"\necho \"$SERVER_SIGNATURE\"    # an other environment variable\necho \"</body></html>\"    # close html\n    \nexit 0"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
      "d18e6e45-85fd-4c78-8371-0a87e9a1adcd": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "content": [
            "dd5f3d39-5c57-4b19-b338-3555680a2fe7",
            "8d7719ea-f59d-4802-9cb8-563e5ef66dea",
            "3728d6ed-02aa-4bb6-a589-5eca72654669",
            "99848a8a-d895-4b35-b99a-5b0469195130",
            "e8b96755-1a48-45bd-a68d-defac9f138a5",
            "eacd4fff-6571-47db-8c3c-82c0c4e64592",
            "658daab4-543a-4dcd-9064-41838c1c96e1",
            "05f24c03-48b8-49ef-9017-9370991cc18e",
            "08d3446e-6ab5-4552-8a69-edb8fd80466b",
            "1433661e-9e2c-4ef8-afdc-c6909a09e7c5",
            "902bab6b-9321-4126-8c30-9a9ba5004af9",
            "31768c29-9663-4528-b90a-d2d25e15c264",
            "c06cd1cc-bef9-4e7c-b15b-418cb045df77",
            "a37e8ae9-92a4-46f7-8a38-4334de6d2911",
            "1bee0f48-2727-4fe1-8509-3e6e40c20f8c",
            "ee4bef93-67dc-4a7a-aa61-e54310b3be86",
            "ce95cffc-fdbc-412f-a670-a7a0820c3eab",
            "7eceae89-5de5-4a64-bb39-00bda439ad3a",
            "840905df-f1b5-4cb2-a8bd-f16461203a80",
